summary:
**Red Dead Redemption** is a popular video game set in 1911, during the end of the American frontier. You play as John Marston, a former outlaw who must hunt down his old gang members to save his family. The game lets you explore a huge open world on horseback or foot, and you can have exciting gunfights using a special "Dead Eye" ability.

The game was made by Rockstar Games and took over five years to create. It was released in 2010 and got lots of praise for its story, graphics, and music. Many people consider it one of the best games ever made.
title: Red Dead Redemption
